SEARCH
Package ca.jolt.files

Class JoltFile

java.lang.Object
ca.jolt.files.JoltFile
public class JoltFile extends Object
Represents an uploaded file stored in memory.

Provides metadata such as the original file name, content type, and file size, along with direct access to the underlying byte data as either a byte[] or an InputStream.

  • Constructor Details

    • JoltFile

      public JoltFile(String fileName, String contentType, long size, byte[] data)
      Constructs a new JoltFile with the specified metadata and file data.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The original file name
      contentType - The MIME content type of the file
      size - The size of the file in bytes
      data - A byte array containing the file's data

  • Method Details

    • fromStatic

      public static JoltFile fromStatic(String filename)
      Creates a JoltFile instance from a static file located in the "static" resource directory.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to be loaded. If the filename starts with a "/", it will be removed.
      Returns:
      a JoltFile instance containing the file data, MIME type, and other metadata.
      Throws:
      JoltHttpException - if the file is not found or if an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getInputStream

      public InputStream getInputStream()
      Returns a new InputStream that reads from the in-memory file data.
      Returns:
      An InputStream for reading the stored file data

    • toFile

      public File toFile() throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • save

      public boolean save(String path)
